gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.scenegraph

Class Blob

  • java.lang.Object
    • gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.scenegraph.SceneGraphNode
      • gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.scenegraph.AbstractPositionEntity
        • gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.scenegraph.Blob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISceneGraphNode, IPosition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MilkyWay

    public abstract class Blob
extends AbstractPositionEntity
    This acts as aggregator node. It does not represent a physical entity, but a set of physical entities that must be rendered together if necessary.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista
